title: Rise Up O Men of God Mens Choir

lines: Rise up, O men of God!
Give heart and soul and mind and strength
To serve the King of Kings.
Rise up, O men of God,
Bring in the day of brotherhood
And end the night of wrong.
Rise up, O men of God!
Tread where his feet have trod.
As brothers of the Son of Man,
Rise up, O men of God!
Rise up! Rise up! Rise up!

credits: Text: William Pierson Merrill, 1867–1954. Used by permission of the Presbyterian Outlook, Richmond, Virginia, USA. Making copies without written permission of the copyright owner is prohibited.
Music: Frank W. Asper, 1892–1973. © 1948 IRI Arr. by Robert P. Manookin, 1918–1997. © 1985 IRI
